akn:subsection.akn:heading: Notice to subscriber regarding personally identifiable information; definitions

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Notice to subscriber regarding personally identifiable information; definitions

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Collection of personally identifiable information using cable system

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Collection of personally identifiable information using cable system

(d) Subscriber access to information A cable subscriber shall be provided access to all personally identifiable information regarding that subscriber which is collected and maintained by a cable operator. Such information shall be made available to the subscriber at reasonable times and at a convenient place designated by such cable operator. A cable subscriber shall be provided reasonable opportunity to correct any error in such information.

(e) Destruction of information A cable operator shall destroy personally identifiable information if the information is no longer necessary for the purpose for which it was collected and there are no pending requests or orders for access to such information under subsection (d) or pursuant to a court order.

akn:content.akn:p: (f) Civil action in United States district court; damages; attorney’s fees and costs; nonexclusive nature of remedy

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Regulation by States or franchising authorities

akn:content.akn:p: (g) Regulation by States or franchising authorities Nothing in this subchapter shall be construed to prohibit any State or any franchising authority from enacting or enforcing laws consistent with this section for the protection of subscriber privacy.
